alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Hancock; Putnam (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 2:51PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Baldwin, southeastern Putnam and west central Hancock Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 251 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Browns Crossing, or 7 miles west of Milledgeville, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Milledgeville, Eatonton, Meriwether, Plant Harlee Branch, Warfield and Browns Crossing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
